8756 << 5 =  280192 / 0b1000100011010000000
87 << 6 = 5568 / 0b1010111000000
4532344 >> 8 =  17704 / 0b100010100101000
78 >> 3 = 9 / 0b1001
7894 & 975 = 710 / 0b1011000110
45 & 1101101 = 45 / 0b101101
634 | 4578 = 5114 / 0b1001111111010
1010101 | 101010 = 1043383 / 0b11111110101110110111
~87 = -88 / -0b1011000
~6 = -7 / -0b111
32 ^15 = 47 / 0b101111
154 ^ 35 = 185 / 0b10111001
